divs: Sighting Detailsme and my girlfriends brother were outside by the garage and he was smoking and i was looking at the sky beause just a few hours ago it was raining really hard and i spotted a chevron shaped formation making no noise no lights just hovbering at faster then avrage speed but not too fast just faster then waht birds would fly. i ran in and got my girlfreind and see saw it too they were round and looked white flying fast.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Hayward
There were no other sightings in Hayward on or around December 25th 2010
Summary: Chevron type formation with no lights or sound
